name: Motorhead
description: The future of racing is here, and it's called MOTORHEAD. This game allows you to hop in one of 10 streamlined racers and test your skills on eight obstacle-filled courses that wind through urban, desert, and seaside terrain.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Graphics: Dedicated Video Graphics Storage: 600 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Fun little game , worth the $5 I picked it up for. Pros:  Great controls (Keep in mind I used an Xbox Controller) Runs perfectly fine on my crap laptop DANK MIDI MUSIC  Cons: Simpler gameplay (just Gas, reverse, handbrake) Not much content Music skipped once   Its a fun racer, with very good controls. if you're in need of a racing game, that genre that is strangely sparse on Steam, Its worth a try. Just flat out racing if you're in need of it.  AND DANK MIDIs
